description: Object entry specifying a referenced Standard Resource

key.description: User name of the entry (no unicity enforced)

text.description: Text shown in Note Text for this object (name of the referenced object)

prefix.description: String to prepend before text in computed Note Text

suffix.description: String to append to text in computed Note Text

placeholder.description: If set to true, object is not linked in the database, and entry only specifies it by its name in the text attribute.

object.description: properties describing a referenced standard resource

relativePath.description: relative path of standard resource object
